Semaphore Documentation

Semaphore Documentation

Semaphore is a web service for continuous integration of Rails applications.

We’re designing it to be very easy to use, but if you have any questions, we hope this site will give you an answer. You can browse available articles in the sidebar on the right hand side.

If you cannot find an answer here, please do not hesitate to email us at semaphore@renderedtext.com.

Articles

  • Adding a new project
  • Custom build commands
  • Collaborator notifications
  • Supported stack
  • Test apps

Semaphore is a service by Rendered Text.
